title: Historic Portside Apartment with Eco Sensibility and Modern Comforts
description: Step into this beautifully restored 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment nestled in Ustka’s famed Port District. With a generous 96 sqm layout, period features blend with tasteful modern upgrades, offering both charm and practicality. Light floods spacious living areas adorned with preserved architectural elements, while energy-efficient features keep running costs low. Residents enjoy access to a peaceful shared courtyard, a seasonal swimming pool, and the security of an automatic gate.
neighborhood_description: The Port District is steeped in maritime history and radiates a vibrant local atmosphere, ideal for those who appreciate stories of the past and the dynamic charm of a seafaring town. Enjoy superb highway access for getaway trips and scenic bike lines throughout the area, allowing for eco-friendly transportation and seaside exploration. The neighborhood offers farmers’ markets, cozy cafés, and quick routes to beaches and dunes.
target_buyer: Ideal for eco-conscious families, historic property lovers, or remote professionals seeking a serene coastal home with traditional charm.
market_positioning: This unique apartment stands out as a rare historic offering in Ustka’s quiet Port District, delivering sustainable living and authentic character amidst the scenic seaside’s vibrant, local culture.
